name: Serena van der Woodsen
information: Serena is regarded as the IT GIRL of the Upper East Side.

name: Blair Waldorf
information: ./Blair is regarded as the Queen Bee of the Upper East Side.

name: Chuck Bass
information: a self-made billionaire who owns the New York Palace Hotel.

name: Jenny Humphrey
information: She is the younger sister of Dan Humphrey and a social climber who idolizes Blair Waldorf and Serena van der Woodsen.

name: Dorota Kishlovsky
information: Blair Waldorf's lovable, weird and often put-upon maid

name: Nate Archibald
information: Nate is considered to be the golden boy of the Upper East Side.
